name: imadisjld
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: sylibr(w0, wceq(cima(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), c1), emptycls))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cima(c0, c1), emptycls))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cin(cdm(c0), c1), emptycls))
-| wb(wceq(cima(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), c1), emptycls))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cima(c0, c1), emptycls))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cin(cdm(c0), c1), emptycls))
-| wb(wceq(cima(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), c1), emptycls))

body.origin: |- wb(wceq(cima(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), c1), emptycls))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cima(c0, c1), emptycls))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cin(cdm(c0), c1), emptycls))

comment: Natural dduction form of one side of ~ imadisj . (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 9-Mar-2020.)
